msg: removing duplicate options method test within testGet (copy-and-paste error?)

author: rwaldhoff
msg: * completing move of socket/stream functionality to HttpConnection
* moving all of the header generation to HttpMethod
* simplifying HttpMethod and HttpMethodBase for extension
* made query string parameter handling more robust w.r.t. multiple values per name, and empty names
* work the Interceptor support back in
but this compiles cleanly and passes all of our existing unit tests.

msg: allow redirects when using the https protocol as well (previously only worked with http)
